overview: Sheltered domesticities and a desire to escape them are laced through Alexis McCrimmon's "Ocean of Interiors".â€¯In this film-poem, oceanic space is mapped against an inner self. Slow-motion shots of concrete floors, urban environments, and everyday objects of the home are juxtaposed with the dreams of a young woman seeking to break out from her landlocked environment.
title: Ocean of Interiors
